data.description:
Welcome to UltraCity, where the neon-lit streets pulse with the rhythm of cybernetic life. Immerse yourself in **the heart of a cyberpunk metropolis** as one of the elite Operators, capable of projecting your consciousness into **a team of skilled heroes** known as the NEON Squad.

![{"height":320,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031334_409258475508039_8965680661115487468_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=vLPJdYZgD4oQ7kNvgH0HtSd&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ATUYh5keaRC-w3dcHPwAi-T&oh=00_AYA6s5ZRZWk0IygUc7D5OK4JSyeH45MTcdNr66wadNkIIQ&oe=66DEE7AF)

Gather **your friends or online allies** and navigate the vibrant, wacky world from the comfort of a virtual bar. A captivating **holographic table** serves as your interface to key locations in the city and beyond. You'll undertake **daring missions** on behalf of the **powerful corporations**, all under the guidance of an enigmatic Handler.

![{"height":320,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003272_521721420250791_1749029299216790958_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=DLPJIy0EeXEQ7kNvgEItSe6&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ATUYh5keaRC-w3dcHPwAi-T&oh=00_AYBRyESA3Mi_aaXdYdcUgKjZYUVy90Eo7TYL3hVnkX7A0A&oe=66DEC569)

But success demands more than just brute force. As you navigate the dangerous streets, underworld, and irradiated badlands, **strategic thinking** and **clever teamwork** will be your greatest assets. Coordinate your squad's actions in **thrilling turn-based tactical battles**, where every decision could mean the difference between victory and defeat.

![{"height":320,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035389_531689589532044_676684193823177442_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=78nZjoE2zqEQ7kNvgF7g-wb&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ATUYh5keaRC-w3dcHPwAi-T&oh=00_AYAd_AMKaBbUJJ6K_Jo2eHj7F8xIi3BUNlpzToJntA6eCw&oe=66DECA8C)

Pre-mission planning is crucial. **Wager wisely** to secure valuable resources and credits, essential for **recruiting new squad members** and **crafting advanced weaponry and cybernetic enhancements**. Choose your team carefully, each member bringing unique skills and abilities to the table. **Customize your squad members** to suit your playstyle!

![{"height":320,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75258663_1026413825701774_4822464484390551879_n.png?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=nR1H42JrJmIQ7kNvgGAceUt&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ATUYh5keaRC-w3dcHPwAi-T&oh=00_AYChJkX89pGi69-NuGEz1EUH6kekNbEfBZCuwpFwJ0KozQ&oe=66DEBED5)

**Forge alliances, outsmart your enemies, and rise to the top of the cybernetic food chain**. Are you ready to become a legend in the AGDA 2024 nominated NEON Squad Tactics?

![{"height":500,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38982660_890964689556631_4106676401776551012_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=mOw9ebU-qU4Q7kNvgGJq_KJ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=ATUYh5keaRC-w3dcHPwAi-T&oh=00_AYBk8MI-EvozXW-iiz4kbHlAe_75hPOK6UH3HPYaqXbFdA&oe=66DEEC80)

changelog.change_log:
- Fix for some ultimate sometimes not purchasable
- Visual fixes for the Quest 3
- AOE animation fixes
- General optimisations
